early_academic_signals: Policy Compiler for Secure Agentic Systems (wf2-20260219-001) — AI agent security architecture NOT yet in mainstream media
ASPEN Brain Decoding (wf2-20260219-007) — Universal neural interface tech 2-3 yrs ahead of mainstream awareness
Southern Ocean Flux Variability (wf2-20260219-011) — Academic confirmation of climate model gaps mentioned in WF1 Signal 10
Perovskite Solar Efficiency Path (wf2-20260219-013) — 15% lead-free solar efficiency academically validated
Biodiversity Extinction Indices (wf2-20260219-019) — Quantitative framework for climate-linked extinction not yet in policy discourse

cross_impact_pairs.description: Policy Compiler for agentic security and recursive jailbreak detection both address the same AI agent attack surface — converging on a formal-methods approach to agent security
Humanoid loco-manipulation and dexterous canonical representations are converging toward a unified manipulation foundation — robotic labor displacement acceleration
EgoScale billion-frame dataset provides the data foundation that humanoid end-effector control papers require — data-model co-evolution in robotics
Agent-based carbon budget modeling and Southern Ocean flux variability both reveal the same insight: current climate transition models underestimate non-linear dynamics
Stablecoin depeg stress modeling and stablecoin design theory both point to same regulatory gap: no academic consensus on stable digital money architecture
Cross-subject brain decoding (ASPEN) and adaptive P300 BCI training represent two different approaches to the same problem: universal neural interfaces without per-user calibration
Foundation model reasoning degradation under distribution shift (Why Thinking Hurts) contradicts the optimistic deployment trajectory of agentic AI in medical settings — capability-deployment gap
